PublicRemarks: Well maintained bungalow!! This fully finished 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is located in the mature neighborhood of Laurentian Hills and is a short walk to grocery shopping, Laurentian park, 4 good schools and public transit. A concrete walkway leads from the driveway to the front door of the home. The front facing living room, dinette, and kitchen take advantage of the large windows and southerly exposure, flooding the space with natural light. The current main floor layout features two bedrooms and a 4 piece bathroom but did originate as a three bedroom and can be switched back. The oversized master bedroom has direct backyard access through double French doors, leading to a backyard deck and beautifully landscaped fenced yard.  In addition to the overall versatility of bungalows, this one has a side door entry that can easily be made private to the basement. In this home, the basement space is just as well maintained as the main floor. Good ceiling heights, lighting, and attention to details make it a space you want to spend time in. It features a 3 piece bathroom, oversized recreation room, storage space, and a room that could be converted to a bedroom. Over the last 5 years, the current owners have made numerous improvements including the recommendations from an energy efficiency audit they had conducted in 2017. This is a well-kept home you donÂ’t want to miss out on!! (62959556)

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this charming and classic one-and-a-half-story all brick home located at 207 Highland Rd. E. in Forest Hill, Kitchener. The spacious yard was recently upgraded with new fencing and tasteful metal gates leading up from the concrete drive with parking for two. In the summer, the large deck with pergola, and walk-out second story balcony, offer an inviting outdoor space to enjoy the large yard and vibrant foliage. The front foyer welcomes guests with elegant tile and the patina of period-correct finishes & trim. Warm, rich hardwood flooring flows throughout the main and upper levels. The closet space in the 2 bedrooms will amaze you for a home of this vintage, featuring 2 closets in the principal bedroom, including a walk-in!  Tile & glass compliment the main shower/bath in the 4 piece bathroom. A functional, tasteful kitchen just off the rear entry is open concept, with plenty of cabinetry, and two windows for abundant natural light. The adjacent dining area is spacious enough for family & guests. A finished basement with Rec Room covered with laminate flooring, plus a second bathroom/laundry area, completes this comfortable, well-maintained home. Newer furnace and AC 2016; many newer windows; 100A service panel; copper wiring w/breakers. The utility room and cold room will impress you with the amount of storage space. PublicRemarks: Welcome to 323 Park St!  This gorgeous century home located in the desirable Cherry Park neighbourhood with over 1500 square feet of living space, is not one to be missed. Currently a legal non-conforming duplex, this two storey home could easily be converted back to a single family residence.  The stunning historical characteristics run throughout this home transporting you back to a time where impeccable craftmanship was put into every aspect of the property.  Original trim surrounding the oversized windows, cast iron heating grates, wainscoting throughout the main floor are just some of the features you find when you first walk into this property. PublicRemarks: It's early morning - you wake ready to step out into the cool morning air and step down into the beautiful serenity your mature neighbourhood offers. As you open the front door you take in that oh-so-familiar smell of the pines and begin your stroll down Moccasin Drive. The tranquility that surrounds you is one of the many reasons you purchased this home - this is the lifestyle you were searching for...and you found it here. Later, soaking in the early morning sun, you find your thoughts drift to the day you first purchased this beautiful home. It was the exact right fit for the family - space both upstairs and down to tailor to your sense of style, an HGTV adventure all your own. The way your eyes lit up, your heart skipped, the way you went through the house like a small child eager to see every room. You fell in love. You were home. Fast forward, mid-day you indulge in an early beverage while enjoying the sun on your rear deck. You've had a productive day in the home office and you're excited for what's to come. As the sun sets and dusk setttles in, like clockwork your guests arrive. Hours later you've laughed so much your cheeks hurt, you've toured people through your home so much you seem to know every inch better than before. People are smiling, laughing, feeling good and it's all because of you. The evening flourishes and everyone is having a blast. The children build snowmen and throw snowballs in the backyard while others enjoy music, laughter and conversation around the dining room table. Tonight will go down in the record books. Tonight is your night. Welcome home. (62940436)
